transportation.transport_mode: Taxi from airport to city center
Airport Express train to city center

food.food_desc: Hopefully your hotel will include breakfast. Otherwise, look for Migros or Coop markets for cheaper options.
There are some ethnic places serving casual meals at decent prices, but most real restaurants charge a lot. Sausages are a good choice here.
Take-away options are a bit less, but sit-down restaurants all start in this range for simple meals, without drink.
Even the local lagers are expensive in Zurich restaurants and bars.
With low alcohol taxes, wine in supermarkets can be cheap.
Cheapskates can buy warm beer in supermarkets or cold beer from small shops in this range.
